result.execSummary:
The defendant Andrew Steven Gould was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Andrew Steven Gould is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Andrew Steven Gould was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
- 1 day against ultimate sentence

In the event that the defendant is revoked or discharged from either probation or extended supervision with outstanding financial obligations, the supervising agent shall notify the court 10 days prior to the revocation or discharge.  A civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victim(s) and/or governmental entities for any balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect all debt.

10:15 AM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: K. Anderson, Attorney Aaron M. Damrau in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Andrew Steven Gould in court.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Andrew Steven Gould. ADA Damrau recites agreement. DE pleads GUILTY to Ct 2 - Bail Jumping - Misd. DE sworn. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. Court reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Court finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Court accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct 2 - Bail Jumping - Misd. On motion of the State without objection, Court dismisses Ct 1. Sentencing recommendations. 

Court orders: 
Ct 2 - Bail Jumping - Misd.
S/W 1 year probation w/ conditions:
- Maintain absolute sobriety
- AODA and follow any recommended treatment
- Complete all other programming as deemed appropriate by the COMPAS assessment and the Department of Corrections 
- Court Costs $243; payable through Clerk of Court
- DNA Sample and Surcharge $200; payable through Clerk of Court

1 day jail credit.
 Monthly payment plan approved at $50/mo commencing 12/1/22. 
Adjourned: 10:24 AM. kma

3:55 PM CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Fox, Defendant Andrew Steven Gould not in court.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Andrew Steven Gould.  Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Set for a plea. Def is unable to appear today as his ride fell through. Court STAYS Warrant until next date.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 17, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 17, 2022 at 10:15 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on October 6, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
Filed by ADA Damrau. km
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.

2:03 PM Crt Comm: Timothy C. Heckmann, RPR: Unmonitored DAR, Clk: Yates. Defendant Andrew Steven Gould appeared by phone.  Attorney Aaron M. Damrau in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Abrianna Dolfi in court for Andrew Steven Gould. Recess 2:04 p.m. Recalled 2:08 p.m. Court reviews personal appearance rights, DE waives personal appearance. Atty Dolfi requests plea hearing. Court confirms address. Court advises of rights and possible penalties regarding a preliminary hearing.  Court finds DF has freely, voluntarily, and knowingly waived the right to a preliminary hearing, finds probable cause that a felony was committed and the DF probably committed that felony and binds over for trial. Court proceeds to arraignment. Court informs Defendant of charges, possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. DE pleads not guilty. Adjourned: 2:14 p.m.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Filed by ADA Damrau.  gll
Filed by Atty Dolfi. km

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

1:50 PM CO: RMW, REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Lindabaur. ADA: Michael Becker  DF ATTY:  Jeremiah Harrelson for today Defendant Andrew Steven Gould appeared by video, in custody. DE updates address and phone. DE understands charges and possible penalties. Waive reading. DE to contact PD to see if qualifies- PFAC also given. DE requests atty in Eau Claire matters be appointed- Atty Francis Rivard. Bond argument. DE turned himself in. Court orders bond. Court sets PH with Court Commissioner. Adjourned at 1:54 PM.  gll

12:45 PM - DE called stating he was not able to come in by 9:00 am to turn himself in. Asked if there was time to get booked in, brought up and released to make it back to Eau Claire Co for his 2:30 hearing today. Advised Judges do not take walk-ins at Intake and if he appears, to which he interrupted and stated that he would be arrested. My response was that he has an arrest warrant and it was his decision on how he would take care of SCC warrant on this matter. kak
Adjoining States. Signed by RMW on 5/26/2022. c: SCSO. km

CO: RMW , REP: Melstrom, CLERK: Liddle ADA:   Michelle P Brekken, NONA by def. Case called at 1:54 p.m. Court notes this matter is set for an initial appearance. DE does not appear. State requesting a warrant. Court based on DE's non appearance will issue a warrant, extraditable adjoining states.
